Farmers in Ben Tre province are taking steps  at
the peak of the winter-spring rice harvest of
2023-2024 with the joy of winning the crop with good prices and
escaping salinity, this result is achieved
thanks to the locality's effective promotion of
irrigation works to prevent salinity and store fresh water
along with favorable weather.
Currently, the average selling price of rice is
10,000 VND/kg depending on the type, an increase of 2,000 to
3,000 VND/kg compared to the same period last year. With the same
yield and selling price as in
this year's winter-spring crop, farmers earn a profit of nearly 20
million VND per
hectare.  The price of rice is L, but the price
is generally very good. In addition, the weather has been
favorable in recent times. The solutions for
sluices to prevent salinity and regulate water
to cope with salinity are promoting
positive effects to help protect goods.  Thousands of
hectares of production land, people also proactively

salinity and fresh water. Early seeding

second thing is to regulate the
works to prevent salinity and store fresh water of the country.  For many

2027 Plastic waste is a
leading environmental problem in Southeast Asia
polluting marine and freshwater ecosystems
around the region  Asia
Pacific to solve this situation.
Scientists at Nanjiang University of Technology,
Singapore are studying
how the digestive system of rice worms decomposes
plastic. Rice worms are larvae of a
beetle called  The science is that the
intestinal microflora of this worm
can decompose plastic.
Using this worm on a large scale is not
feasible because it is difficult to maintain large numbers of
rice worms after eating their plastic.  will
quickly develop into beetles. At
this point, they can no longer decompose plastic.
We removed the bacteria from the
rice worm's intestinal tract and put them in a
test tube with new pieces of plastic.
They began to grow and divide.
Scientists are researching
how to create plastic-eating bacteria in a
test tube without the need for rice worms and
then expand the scale. We also need to
promote recycling efforts and combine them with
solutions.  Method of using rice worms The United Nations
estimates that the plastic waste
dumped into the ocean in the Asia Pacific region will reach
6.4 million tons by

Today, the authorities of
Thua Thien Hue province began to determine the
cause of the accident that killed two people
on the spot and injured many others.
happened on the Cam Lo La Son highway,
in which both drivers violated
traffic safety laws.
Driver Le Hoang Quan, born in 1973,
residing in Dak Nong province, drove the passenger car
without paying attention, causing an accident
while driving.  Driver Phan Dinh Thanh, born in
1986, residing in Thua Thien Hue province, dumped the truck and
occupied part of the road but did not
place danger signs according to regulations. Through
testing, both drivers were drug-free
and had current alcohol levels.  Those who were
slightly injured in the traffic accident were
supported by the authorities to
continue their journey. Three seriously injured people are being
treated at the hospital. The
authorities also performed autopsies on the
bodies of the two dead victims.  Mr. Van
Son, born in 2004, and Ms. Thi Phong,
born in 2007, both residing in Ky Son district,
Nghe An province. At the same time, initial support
for relatives of the deceased was 5 million VND
each. Three injured people were 2 million
VND each.  This is the end of
